content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am good. I am looking for a new place to live, and I was wondering if you had any advice?
Oh, yes I do. I have lived in quite a few places, and I know what to look for.
That would be great. What should I be looking for?
Well, first you need to decide what you need in a home.
I need a home that is close to school and has a quiet environment so I can focus on my studies.
That is good to know. What about price range?
I have about $1,000 a month to spend on rent.
Okay, that gives you a few options.
I am also looking for a home that is pet friendly.
Okay, there are a few apartment complexes that allow pets.
That is great. I am also looking for a home that has a washer and dryer in unit.
There are a few apartments that have that, but they are usually more expensive.
I am willing to pay more if I can find a place that meets all of my needs.
Okay, I will start looking for some options for you.
